Worcester.Busta Rhymes Island: Busta Rhymes Island is the proposed name of an unnamed island in Shrewsbury, Worcester County, Massachusetts. The island is named after the rapper Busta Rhymes and is located in Mill Pond in Shrewsbury and measures 40x40 feet. The proposal was made by Shrewsbury resident Kevin O'Brien who began frequenting and caring for the upkeep of the island.
